mission_section.title: Our Mission
mission_section.description: To democratize quality education by providing free, engaging, and effective educational games that inspire curiosity, foster creativity, and build essential skills for the 21st century.
mission_section.vision_description: A world where every child has access to high-quality educational content that makes learning joyful, meaningful, and transformative.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: EduGameHQ was born from a simple observation: children learn best when they're having fun. Founded in 2023 by a team of educators, game developers, and child psychologists, we set out to bridge the gap between entertainment and education.

growth.title: Growth & Expansion
growth.description: What started as a small collection of math games has grown into a comprehensive platform serving over 50,000 students worldwide. Our games cover mathematics, science, coding, language arts, and critical thinking skills.

today.title: Today & Beyond
today.description: Today, EduGameHQ continues to evolve, always guided by our core belief that quality education should be free, accessible, and enjoyable for every child.

team_section.title: Meet Our Team
team_section.intro: Our diverse team of educators, developers, and researchers work together to create the best possible learning experience for students worldwide.
